name: Boucle & Walnut Armchair
description: Add a subtle touch of texture to your interiors with our Bouclé & Walnut Armchair. Upholstered in soft off-white bouclé fabric, sitting on a walnut-stained timber frame. A regular sell out piece the Bouclé and Walnut Armchair has been featured in the Sunday Times, Sheerluxe and Who What Wear.
